document_data.name: Threlked Ironfist
document_data.mainbody: '''Threlked Ironfist''' was the king of [[Tuern]] in the midâ€”14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Threlked appeared somewhat grizzled, having grey hair and a bald upper head. He often wore his [[armor]] and held his [[sword]] in hand.
document_data.Personality: The High King was civil, but he was also gruff.
document_data.History: In [[1358 DR]], the [[Heroes of Ascore]], as well as several other adventuring groups, made their way to Tuern following vast rumors of [[meteorite]] ore being located on the volcanic island. King Threlked met with them, and warned the heroes that the many canyons across the isles were filled with very dangerous monsters.
